operator.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is equal to the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.
The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is not equal to the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.
The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is greater than the value in cell B1; otherwise it returns FALSE.
The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is less than the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.
The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is greater than or equal to the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.
The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is less than or equal to the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.
